/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.title: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.name: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.doc:
To monitor Dell iDRAC devices with Prometheus, you can use the SNMP Exporter and use it with the snmp.yml configuration file.

Below you can find other users from our community that have already configured the SNMP Exporter for Dell iDRAC devices. Click on their repository links to see their helm release and in the same directory you should find a config map with the snmp.yml configuration file.

1:
provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"

0:
mqtt:
  host: emqx
  topic_prefix: frigate
  user: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_USER}
  password: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_PASSWORD}
database:
  path: /data/frigate.db
detectors:
  coral:
    type: edgetpu
    device: pci
objects:
  track:
  - person
  - dog
  filters:
    person:
      min_area: 2500
      max_area: 100000
      threshold: 0.7
    dog:
      min_area: 1000
      max_area: 10000
      threshold: 0.7
ffmpeg:
  hwaccel_args:
  - -hwaccel
  - vaapi
  - -hwaccel_device
  - /dev/dri/renderD128
  - -hwaccel_output_format
  - yuv420p
  # Enable audio on recordings...
  # might cause issues on recording playback
  output_args:
    record: -f segment -segment_time 10 -segment_format mp4 -reset_timestamps 1 -strftime 1 -c:v copy -c:a aac
cameras:
  # --
  doorbell:
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Sub Stream
      # - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
      #   roles:
      #   - detect
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        - record
    detect:
      width: 720
      height: 576
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    rtmp:
      enabled: True
    
  front_door:
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

  garage:
    rtmp:
      enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 30
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

version: 2
global:
  private_key: /etc/dendrite/matrix_key.pem
  server_name: "${SECRET_PUBLIC_DOMAIN}"
  well_known_server_name: "dendrite.${SECRET_PUBLIC_DOMAIN}:443"
  well_known_client_name: "https://dendrite.${SECRET_PUBLIC_DOMAIN}:443"
  database:
    connection_string: postgresql://dendrite:${SECRET_DENDRITE_DB_PASSWD}@postgresql/dendrite?sslmode=disable
  cache:
    max_size_estimated: 600mb
  report_stats:
      enabled: true
  jetstream:
    storage_path: "/jetstream"
media_api:
  base_path: /media
client_api:
  registration_shared_secret: "${SECRET_DENDRITE_REGISTRATION_SHARED_SECRET}"
mscs:
  mscs:
    - msc2836 # Threading
    - msc2946 # Spaces
    - msc2444 # Peeking over federation
    - msc2753 # Peeking via sync
sync_api:
  search:
    enabled: true
    base_path: /search
    language: "en"
logging:
  - type: std
    level: debug
1:
version: 2
global:
  server_name: "${SECRET_DOMAIN_SECONDARY}"
  private_key: matrix_key.pem
  key_validity_period: "168h0m0s"
  cache:
    max_size_estimated: "1gb"
    max_age: "1h"
  well_known_server_name: "dendrite.${SECRET_DOMAIN}:443"
  well_known_client_name: "https://dendrite.${SECRET_DOMAIN}/"
  well_known_sliding_sync_proxy: "https://syncv3.${SECRET_DOMAIN}"
  trusted_third_party_id_servers:
    - matrix.org
    - vector.im
  disable_federation: false
  presence:
    enable_inbound: false
    enable_outbound: false
  report_stats:
    enabled: false
    endpoint: https://matrix.org/report-usage-stats/push
  server_notices:
    enabled: false
    local_part: "_server"
    display_name: "Server alerts"
    avatar_url: ""
    room_name: "Server Alerts"
  jetstream:
    addresses:
      []
    in_memory: false
    storage_path: /var/dendrite/jetstream
    topic_prefix: "Dendrite"
  metrics:
    enabled: false
    basic_auth:
      username: "metrics"
      password: "metrics"
  dns_cache:
    enabled: false
    cache_size: 256
    cache_lifetime: 5m
  database:
    connection_string: postgresql://dendrite:${SECRET_DENDRITE_POSTGRES_PASSWORD}@dendrite-psql-v16-rw.default.svc/dendrite?sslmode=disable
    max_open_conns: 90
    max_idle_conns: 5
    conn_max_lifetime: -1
app_service_api:
  config_files:
    []
client_api:
  registration_disabled: true
  registration_shared_secret: "${SECRET_DENDRITE_REGISTRATION_SECRET}"
  enable_registration_captcha: false
  recaptcha_public_key: ""
  recaptcha_private_key: ""
  recaptcha_bypass_secret: ""
  recaptcha_siteverify_api: ""
  turn:
    turn_password: ""
    turn_shared_secret: ""
    turn_uris: []
    turn_user_lifetime: ""
    turn_username: ""
  rate_limiting:
    enabled: true
    threshold: 5
    cooloff_ms: 500
    exempt_user_ids:
federation_api:
  send_max_retries: 16
  disable_tls_validation: false
  key_perspectives:
    - keys:
      - key_id: ed25519:auto
        public_key: Noi6WqcDj0QmPxCNQqgezwTlBKrfqehY1u2FyWP9uYw
      - key_id: ed25519:a_RXGa
        public_key: l8Hft5qXKn1vfHrg3p4+W8gELQVo8N13JkluMfmn2sQ
      server_name: matrix.org
  prefer_direct_fetch: false
key_server:
media_api:
  base_path: "/var/dendrite/media"
  max_file_size_bytes: 10485760
  dynamic_thumbnails: false
  max_thumbnail_generators: 10
  thumbnail_sizes:
    - height: 32
      method: crop
      width: 32
    - height: 96
      method: crop
      width: 96
    - height: 480
      method: scale
      width: 640
mscs:
  mscs:
    - msc2836
room_server:
  default_room_version: 11
sync_api:
  search:
    enabled: true
    index_path: "/var/dendrite/search"
    language: "en"
user_api:
  bcrypt_cost: 10
tracing:
  enabled: false
  jaeger:
    baggage_restrictions: null
    disabled: false
    headers: null
    reporter: null
    rpc_metrics: false
    sampler: null
    serviceName: ""
    tags: []
    throttler: null
logging:
  - level: info
    params:
      path: /var/dendrite-log/dendrite
    type: file

0: sabnzbd, sabnzbd.media, sabnzbd.media.svc, sabnzbd.media.svc.cluster, sabnzbd.media.svc.cluster.local, sabnzbd.${SECRET_DOMAIN}
